[Tt]emp/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Pp]rojectSettings/ProjectVersion.txt
[Pp]ackageCache/
[Oo]bj/
[Mm]emoryCaptures/

*.csproj
*.pidb
*.suo
*.user
*.userprefs
*.unityproj
*.booproj
*.svd
*.pdb
*.opendb
*.VC.db
*.idea/

# Logs, temporary files, crash reports, etc.
*.log
*.stacktrace
*.plist

# Unity3D generated meta files
*.pidb.meta
